name: Big Red Chicken
description:
Big red chicken enjoys eating flying bugs, though they're  quite hard to catch with those little wings.

Flap left wing : Left click or Left arrow or A or J
Flap right wing : Right click or Right arrow or D or L
Flap both wings at once to gain height
Catch bugs without touching the ground to get a combo that multiplies your score

This game was made for the VIDEO GAMES LAB : Game Jam 2021
Isn't it arcadey with its score system? You can play as long as you survive!
Dude it's so hard to squeeze coins out of people nowadays...

Shertigan : Sound
Wampy : Art
Ypsilon : Programming
